extendedInfo.description: Tv Guide India--------------------	* Get the Complete schedule for most of Tv Channels in India	* Add Reminder for a program	* Share the program	* Add the channels to your favourite List for easy access.List of Channels Category-------------------------------------     1) Movies Channels     2) Entertainment Channels      3) Sports Channels      4) Documentary Channels      5) News Channels      6) Kids Channels      7) Lifestyle & Music Channels      8)  Food & Spritual ChannelsList Of Channels------------------------	Asianet Movies, B4U Movies, Cinema Tv, Filmy, Fox Action Movies, Gemini Movies, HBO, India Talkies, Jaya Movies, KTV, MGM, Movies Now, Movies Ok, Raj Digital Plus, Set Max, Sony Pix, Star Gold, Star Gold Hd, Star Movies, Star Movies Hd, Udaya Movies, UTV Action, UTV Movies, WB, World Movies, Zee Action, Zee Cinema, Zee Classic, Zee Premier, Zee Studio, Zee Talkies.	9X, Amrita Tv, Asianet, Asianet Plus, Asianet Suvarna, Australia Network, AXN, Big CBS Love, Big CBS Prime, Big CBS Spark, Bindass Tv, Colors, Comedy Central, DD  Bharati, DD India, DD National, DD Urdu, Etv, Etv Bangla, Etv Bihar, Etv Gujarati, Etv Kannada, Etv Marathi, Etv MP, Etv Oriya, Etv Rajasthan, Etv UP, Etv Urdu, Firangi, Fox Crime, Fox Traveller, FX, Gemini Tv, Jaya Tv, Jeevan Tv, Kairali Tv, Kalaignar Tv, Kiran Tv, Life Ok, Maa Gold, Maa Tv, Mi Marathi, Raj Tv, SAB TV, Sahara One, Sony TV, Star Jalsha, Star Plus, Star Plus HD, Star Pravah, Star Utsav, Star Vijay, Star World, Star World HD, Sun Tv, Surya Tv, Udaya, Zee Cafe, Zee Kannada, Zee Marathi, Zee Smile, ZEE TV, Zing, Zoom.	DD Sports, Espn, Neo Prime, Neo Sports, Sony Six, Star Cricket, Star Sports, Ten Action, Ten Cricket, Ten Golf, Ten Sports.	Animal Planet, Discovery Channel, Discovery HD, Discovery Science, Discovery Turbo, History Tv 18, Nat Geo Adventure, Nat Geo Wild, National Geographic, National Geographic HD.	Asianet News, BBC World News, CNBC AWAAZ, CNBC Tv 18, CNN, CNN-IBN, DD News, ETv 2, IBN 7, IBN Lokmat, NDTV 24x7, NDTV India, NDTV Profit.	 Animax, Cartoon Network, Chutti Tv, Disney Channel, Disney XD, Hungama TV, Kochu Tv, Kushi Tv, Nickelodeon, POGO, ZeeQ. reviews.title: I love app but check my suggestion
reviews.comment: I love this app but I have a suggestion to you guys so that\'s why I have only one star. Here it is (when we open any channel it automatically opens that day schedule , if any one wants to check schedule for other day he/she should wait until to load for that day and he/she should choose the desired day my suggestion is when one opens any channel it should ask the day of which he/she wants and load it directly.hope u will update it so I can give 5 stars.
reviews.author: akhil kumar Vigrahala

reviews.title: Great app !!!!
reviews.comment: Excellent app, covers every INDIAN channel, just one SUGGESTION is when i click on a channel a list of ongoing program and those about to come are displayed, it would be great if the aap shows the full schedule of the day :)
reviews.author: tejas kutal

reviews.title: Waste app
reviews.comment: Don\'t install this app. None of the channels are playing .just only remainder and share no play option

reviews.comment: Everything is good..  but there are many channels that are missing.. which I watch on my TV  Update with more channels
